item.title: Best Time to Buy and Sell Stock
item.description: Solution: two pointer Code: class Solution: def maxProfit(self, prices: List[int]) -> int: maxP = 0 l, r = 0, 1 while r < len(prices): profit = prices[r] - prices[l] if profit > 0: maxP = max(profit, maxP) else: l = r r += 1 return maxP Time Complexity: O(n) Space Complexity: O(1)
